hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.subtitle: We are committed to protecting your privacy and being transparent about how we use your data.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.text: Welcome to our platform. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our services.

headings.dataTypesIntro: We may collect the following types of information:

protection.title: Data Protection
protection.content: We protect your data using advanced encryption and never share it with third parties without your consent.

security.title: Information Security
security.content: We apply high security standards using secure servers and strong encryption protocols to prevent unauthorized access.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.content: You can review, update, or request deletion of your data at any time. We clearly explain how we use your data.

storage.title: Data Storage
storage.content: We retain your data only as long as necessary to provide the service and then delete it securely.

rights.title: User Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, modify, delete, or request a copy of your data.

updates.title: Updates
updates.content: We may update this policy and will notify you of material changes via email or within the site.
